name: elm-browser
description: Smalltalk-like System Browser for Elm projects

scripts.start: cp src/elm/.Main.elm.normal src/elm/Main.elm && elm-make src/elm/Main.elm --yes --warn --output dist/js/elm.js && electron .
scripts.debug: cp src/elm/.Main.elm.debug src/elm/Main.elm && elm-make src/elm/Main.elm --yes --warn --output dist/js/elm.js && electron .

author: Martin Janiczek
